maqras.text: 30|1|Ai lie fu, lia mu, mi mu.
30|2|Luoma ren yi baibei yu
30|3|zuijin di difang. Tamen ji bai zhihou, jiang huo shengli,
30|4|yu shu nian zhi jian. Yiqian he yihou, fanshi gui an la zhuchi. Zai na ri, xindao de ren jiangyao huanxi.
30|5|Zhe shi youyu an la de yuanzhu, ta yuanzhu tasuo yiyu zhe. Ta que shi wanneng de, que shi zhi ci de.
30|6|An la yingxu (tamen shengli), an la bing bu shuangyue, dan renmen daban bu zhidao.
30|7|Tamen zhi zhidao jinshi shenghuo de biaomian, tamen duiyu houshi, shi shuhu de.
30|8|Nandao tamen meiyou siwei ma? An la chuangzao tiandi wanwu, zhi yi zhenli he dingqi, you xuduo ren dique buxin jiang yu tamen de zhu xiang hui.

30|9|Nandao tamen meiyou zai dadishang luxing er guancha qian ren de jieju shi zenyang de ma? Qian ren bi tamen shili geng da, qian ren yu difang de ken zhi he jianshe, shengguo tamen. Tamen zu zhong de shizhe gei tamen dai laile xuduo de mingzheng. Gu an la buzhi kuidai tamen, dan tamen kui wangle tamen ziji,
30|10|ranhou e bao nai zuo'e zhe de jieju, yinwei tamen fouren an la de jixiang, erqie jiayi chaoxiao.
30|11|An la chuangzao zhongsheng, ranhou zaizao tamen, ranhou, nimen bei zhao guiyu ta
30|12|fuhuo ri lailin shi, fanzui de ren, jiangcheng jusang de.
30|13|Tamen de pei zhu zhong, jianglai meiyou wei tamen shuo qing de, tamen jiang fouren tamen de pei zhu.
30|14|Fuhuo shi lailin zhi ri, tamen jiang bici fenli.
30|15|Zhiyu xindao erqie xingshan zhe, jiang zai yige shengdi, ganjue kuaile;
30|16|zhiyu bu xindao erqie fouren wo de jixiang, yiji houshi de xiang hui zhe, jiang bei jujin zai xingfa zhong.
30|17|Gu nimen zai wan xi he zaochen, yingdang zansong an la chaojue wanwu.
30|18|Tiandi jian de zansong, yiji bangwan de he zhongwu de zansong dou zhi guiyu ta.
30|19|Ta shi shengwu cong si wu zhongshengchu, shi si wu cong shengwu zhong shengchu, shi yi si de dadi fuhuo, nimen ye yao ruci bei fuhuo.
30|20|Ta de yi zhong jixiang shi: Ta yong nitu chuangzao nimen, ranhou, nimen like chengwei renlei, sanbu ge fang.

30|21|Ta de yi zhong jixiang shi: Ta cong nimen de tonglei zhong wei nimen chuangzao pei'ou, yibian nimen yilian tamen, bingqie shi nimen huxiang ai yue, huxiang lianxu. Duiyu neng siwei de minzhong, ci zhong que you xuduo jixiang.
30|22|Ta de yi zhong jixiang shi: Tiandi de chuangzao, yiji nimen de yuyan he fuse de chayi, duiyu you xuewen de ren, ci zhong que you xuduo jixiang.
30|23|Ta de yi zhong jixiang shi: Nimen zai heiye he baizhou shuimian bingqie xunqiu ta de enhui; duiyu hui tinghua de minzhong, ci zhong que you xuduo jixiang.

30|24|Ta de yi zhong jixiang shi: Ta shi nimen yi kongju he qitu de xinqing kan dianguang, ta cong tianshang jiangxia yushui, jie yushui shi yi si de da di fuhuo, duiyu neng liaojie de minzhong, ci zhong que you xuduo jixiang.
30|25|Ta de yi zhong jixiang shi: Tiandi yi ta de yizhi er jianding, dang ta dui changmian yu dixia de nimen jiao yisheng de shihou, nimen like jiu chulaile.
30|26|Tiandi wanwu, zhishi ta de; yiqie dou fucong ta.
30|27|Ta chuangzao zhong sheng, ranhou zaizao tamen, zaizao duiyu ta shi geng rongyi de. Tiandi jian zuigao de dianxing, zhi shuyu ta, ta shi wanneng de, zhi rui de.

30|28|Ta wei nimen er jiu nimen zishen she yige piyu; nandao nimen zhunxu nimen de nubi yu nimen gongtong xiangshou wo shangci nimen de jiyang, er nimen yu tamen wanquan pingdeng, nimen weiju tamen, youru nimen huxiang weiju yiyang ma? Wo zheyang wei neng liaojie de minzhong jieshi wo de jixiang.
30|29|Buran, bu yi zhe, wuzhi di shuncong ziji de siyu. An la shi zhi mi wu zhe, shei neng yindao ta ne? Tamen jue meiyou yuanzhu zhe.
30|30|Ni yingdang quxiang zhengjiao,(bing jin shou) an la suo fuyu ren de benxing. An la suo chuangzao de, shi burong biangeng de; zhe cai shi zhengjiao, dan renmen daban bu zhidao.
